experience.title: Senior Associate Data scientist L1
experience.description: Building GenAI powered Engineering CoPilot that can be used by engineers to improve the Speed and Quality of Software development. This tool allows engineers to concentrate on their core responsibilities while creating an integrated ecosystem utilizing GenAI to amplify their capabilities. This not only results in consistent and superior quality engineering, but also adds value to the end customer.

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: - Developed a complimentary item recommendation system for fashion retail to complete the look based on location & trend - Designed a model using image background for location info. and different segmentation technique for outfit feature embedding - Applied facial Detection for person info. & Deployed the model using flask API through Docker and AWS on Bodhi platform
